name: package.json
description: To start the webapp, first clone the repository onto your local machine. Then, using the command line, navigate into the "team12" project folder, and then navigate into the “app” directory. Then, you can type:

scripts.setup: cd app && cd server && npm install && cd .. && npm install && cd ..
scripts.build-run: cd app && npm run build && cd server && node server.js && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.start: cd app && cd server && npm install && node server.js && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd app && npm install && npm run build && cd ..
